about_the_game:
False Hero is a fast-paced soulslike adventure with a unique ability system, imaginative setting, and gripping soundtrack. Copy your enemies' attacks and weave their moves into your own combos to dominate your foes.

In a realm where gods create life, Death starts to spread. You are the last hope in destroying the evil the gods have brought upon themselves. Will you side with Life or fight for Death itself?

Fast-paced combat

The corrupted minions of Death are fast and unpredictable. But so are you.

Perform a quick dash to evade enemy attacks, chain together your own combo of abilities and utilize the power of gods to stay as aggressive as possible.

Challenging boss fights

The many boss fights will truly put your combat skills to the test. From giant arachnoid beasts to fast angelic beings, every single boss is designed with their unique move set to be challenging but fair.

Unique World

From lush swamps to ancient cities, each region features its own unique enemies and puzzles. Explore the twisting and interconnected lands of the gods and uncover the truth behind the spreading of Death.



  • Face off against unique and challenging boss monsters
  • Copy your enemies' attacks and weave their moves into your own combos
  • Explore large, interconnected levels and uncover their secrets
  • Acquire the god's powers to solve puzzles and gain an edge in combat
  • Decide the fate of this world: rescue the gods of Life or become an apostle of Death

All lands have fallen to Death and been corrupted beyond repair. Let them live on or destroy them once and for all.
